testcase.name: EDINET.EC8021W
testcase.description: EDINET.EC8021W: 'EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI' or 'CurrentPeriodEndDateDEI' must not be more than one year earlier than 'FilingDateCoverPage'.

variation.name: invalid01
variation.description: CurrentPeriodEndDateDEI is more than one year earlier than FilingDateCoverPage.
